entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 08 February 2023
